name: Event Building 1 [Failure]
uniques: Triggers a [Citizens are disatisfied!] event <when between [0] and [-5] Happiness> <for every [1] [turns]>

name: Event Building 3 [Failure]
uniques: Triggers a [Citizens are disatisfied!] event <when number of [Happiness] is between [0] and [-10]>

name: Event Building 4 [Failure]
uniques: Triggers a [Citizens are disatisfied!] event <every [2] turns>

name: Event Building 5 [Success]
uniques: Triggers a [Citizens are disatisfied!] event <upon turn end>

name: Event Building 5 [Success]
uniques: Triggers a [Citizens are disatisfied!] event <upon turn end>
